org.jitsi.videobridge

Class ConferenceSpeechActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jitsi.videobridge.ConferenceSpeechActivity

  • public class ConferenceSpeechActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the speech activity of the Endpoints in a Conference. Identifies the dominant speaker Endpoint in the Conference and maintains an ordered list of the Endpoints in the Conference sorted by recentness of speaker domination and/or speech activity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      ConferenceSpeechActivity(org.jitsi.videobridge.ConferenceSpeechActivity.Listener listener, Logger parentLogger)
      Initializes a new ConferenceSpeechActivity instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void activeSpeakerChanged(java.lang.String id)
      Notifies this instance that the underlying dominant speaker identification has elected a new active/dominant speaker.
      void endpointsChanged(java.util.List<AbstractEndpoint> conferenceEndpoints)
      Notifies this instance that the list of endpoints changed.
      JSONObject getDebugState()
      Gets a JSON representation of the parts of this object's state that are deemed useful for debugging.
      AbstractEndpoint getDominantEndpoint()
      Gets the Endpoint which is the dominant speaker in the multipoint conference represented by this instance.
      java.util.List<AbstractEndpoint> getOrderedEndpoints()
      Gets a read-only list of endpoints in "LastN" order.
      void levelChanged(AbstractEndpoint endpoint, long level)
      Notifies this instance that a new audio level was received or measured by an Endpoint.
